item.description:
Join us for a social gathering to enjoy good food and discuss "who we are and where we are going" in light of the "Empire" culture we are immersed in as described in the movie we watched last Tuesday, "What a way to go!". Even if you missed the movie, feel free to join us! Interesting discussion to be had.

Bring a dish for the potluck and utensils for enjoying! If you have a portable chair that would be good too!

See you there!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: "What a way to go!" Movie Discussion
